category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PCA_RuleSearch_SavedQueries
preference.preference_description: Lists the saved queries displayed in the client for Context Independent searches for Configurator Rules in the Product Configurator application. The only value available by default is "Configurator Rules", which is a generic saved query given to perform search on all types of rules. Additional Valid values are the names of saved queries created on a specific type of rule.
